root.name: Jeep Thrills
root.description: Jeep®, the king of the off road adventure, invites you to climb into the driver’s seat and experience racing like never before. With 18 customisable vehicles and 35 intense tracks there is only one objective: to rule the racing world by conquering the terrain and elements. A thrilling off road adventure is assured so strap yourself in and make sure you make the most of your vehicle and the surroundings to take the chequered flag. Variety of game modes including Group Race, Tournament, Custom and Multiplayer. Unlock new tracks, vehicles, tournaments and difficulty levels by successfully completing Group Races and Tournament events. Boosting can make or break your race. Use it well and you can catapult yourself to the front and the chequered flag but misuse it and you could end up off the track without a hope. Study the tracks well to see if there are any shortcuts or big jumps you can use to gain boost power and that extra advantage that will help you win the race.
